The _Entrelacs_ system is a computing environment where the "arrow" supersedes the "bit" as the fundamentally smallest piece of information. By "arrow", one means an immutable and uniquely defined oriented link between two said "arrows". _Entrelacs_  proposes to represent Knowledge with redundancy-free structures uniquely built from _arrows_.
